subject: [Radiance-general] two sided surfa
body:
Try adjusting the ?sj specular jittering parameter between 0 and 1. Looks like the default is ?sj 1, so you might run a test with ?sj 0.3 for comparison. I?m not sure which one would actually look better though, or if it affects accuracy.
